All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationConfiguration
Application configuration class responsible for providing configuration details.
BaseModel
Base model containing common properties shared by other models.
Category
Model class: Represents a category of products.
CategoryRepository
Repository interface: Manages data operations for categories.
ControllerAdvice
Controller Advice to handle exceptions globally in the application.
ErrorDto
DTO class: Represents an error message.
FakeStoreCategoryDto
DTO class: Represents category-related data communication between API calls to FakeStoreAPI.com.
FakeStoreProductDto
DTO class: Represents product-related data communication between API calls to FakeStoreAPI.com.
FakeStoreProductService
Service implementation for interacting with products from the FakeStoreAPI.
InitiatePaymentRequestDto
DTO class: Represents the request data for initiating a payment.
PaymentController
Controller class responsible for handling payment-related requests.
PaymentGatewaySelectionStrategy
Service class responsible for selecting the payment gateway.
PaymentResponse
 
PaymentService
 
Product
Model class: Represents a product.
ProductController
Controller class responsible for handling HTTP requests related to products.
ProductCreationException
Exception thrown when a product creation operation fails.
ProductNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested product cannot be found.
ProductRepository
Repository interface: Manages data operations for products.
ProductRequestDto
DTO class: Handles Create Product POST/PUT/PATCH request data communications between API calls.
ProductService
Service interface: Handles all product-related operations.
RazorpayConfig
Configuration class for integrating Razorpay payment gateway.
RazorpayPaymentServiceImpl
Service class implementing the PaymentService interface for Razorpay payments.
RazorpayWebHookController
Controller class: Handles webhook requests from Razorpay.
SelfDBProductService
Service implementation for handling product-related requests using the application's own database.
SpringProductCatalogueApplication
The main class for the Product Catalogue application built on Spring Boot.
StripePaymentServiceImpl
 
StripeWebHookController
